type.description: The type of the interactable screen (decides which menu to open).

reenable_on_interact.description: [bool]When itneracting, set all the interactable zones to enabled again immediately, so we don't need to manually re-enabled them from the menu screen.

use_character_state.description: [bool]If true then the interacting player will be put into a state for interacting

start_avatar_animation.description: [string]Animation to play when starting to use this interact

end_avatar_animation.description: [string]Animation to play when starting to use this interact
